data.description: Advanced study of current topics in elementary, middle and high school visual arts education.
data.title: SEMINAR IN ART EDUCATION

data.description: Examination of foundational principles of art education and art curriculum planning, instruction and assessment for kindergarten through twelfth-grade students.
data.title: FOUNDATIONS IN ART EDUCATION

data.description: Explore art education careers, develop art and art-integrated curriculum, practice instructional strategies, and conduct fieldwork in community and school-based settings.
data.title: INTRODUCTION TO TEACHING ART

data.description: Observation and instruction of elementary and secondary pupils in a laboratory setting. Lecture and discussion of topics related to art instruction.
data.title: PRACTICUM IN SECONDARY SCHOOL ART

data.description: Observation and instruction of learners in elementary and secondary school settings. Study of art curriculum, instruction, assessment, learner diversity and class management.
data.title: PRACTICUM IN ART EDUCATION

data.description: Student-designed project and activities to explore a topic in depth.
data.title: INDEPENDENT READING AND RESEARCH

data.description: Student-designed project and activities to explore a topic in depth.
data.title: ADVANCED INDEPENDENT READING

data.description: Study of principles in art curriculum planning, instruction and assessment, classroom management and learner diversity in elementary and secondary schools.
data.title: METHODS IN ART EDUCATION

data.description: Supervised student teaching in elementary art classrooms.
data.title: STUDENT TEACHING IN ELEMENTARY ART

data.description: Supervised student teaching in middle or high school art classrooms.
data.title: STUDENT TEACHING IN SECONDARY ART
